short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the colour of your piazza topbar to match a unique hex code or colour of your choice!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Piazza's built in colour customization for the topbar has limited colour selection. This extension will allow for unique colour choices to make using Piazza and studying more engaging!
